judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellant.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Daniel J. Beggy, with him Mansmann, Beggy, Me-Terry & Baxter, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Hunt Estate.
Argued September 29, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Daniel J. Beggy, with him Mansmann, Beggy, Me-Terry & Baxter, for appellant.
Michael Georgalas, for appellee.
December 20, 1971:
